website_summaries.verdict: A good pick for a rusty player trying to get back in the habit, or for a beginner who's on the fence.
pros: Closed hole C flute with offset G key and split E key
Double bladder pads and rubber key bumpers
Comes with case, joint grease, cleaning cloth, rod, and a pair of gloves
cons: Some notes at the upper and lower ends of the registers are difficult to play

customer_reviews.title: Great for its price. Don't expect to go pro on this.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not for somebody who intends to play everyday and with a large professional ensemble. BUT it's great for my purpose, picking up every now and then just to keep the fingers going and the chops in shape. Would be good for somebody just learning. Great for parents who's kids just joined band and don't want to yet invest in something more substantial, just in case their kid decides they want to play something else.
customer_reviews.author: B. K. Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Great value in a beginner flute - seems well made and not "cheap"
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful instrument and seems well-made. Having said that I can see why some complain that it breaks when used by children. I would not expect it to stand up to harsh treatment. It comes with nice accessories and the case is well-made if a little small to fit all the things that come with it. I know they were in the case when I got it, but I was not able to put them all back in again. The flute and most important things fit just fine. I am a beginner so I can't say anything about how it plays or the sound yet. I have not received incentive to write this review.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Terribly made !!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in 7th grade marching band, I thought it would be nice for her to have her own flute instead of a rental at school, the flute was fine for the first six months of her 6th gradethen it fell apart the first week of 7th grade. Her instructor suggested we get it replaced by the company with an upgrade due to the unconvince of her being without an instrument and an upcoming parade to attend !! I would not recommend this flute as it is made poorly and is not reliable as a school instrument !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Falling apart already and it been less than three months since purchased.
customer_reviews.text: The item was purchased around mid December 2018, which was around three months ago, and already having problems with the flute. One of the screws came lose and was lost, therefore the tubing was detached. Also, one of the keys was curving upwards. I contacted customer service and received a response fairly quickly. I was told to use some pressure and pushed the key downward, so that kind of solved the issue. As for the lost screw, I was told that I will receive a replace screw in one to two weeks, which was unacceptable to me. As another reviewer stated, the quality is not that great. The flute was not even used on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this flute to teach myself and so far I'm loving it .. would absolutely buy again
customer_reviews.author: MIGUEL BARRAGAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Flute For Middle School
customer_reviews.text: Very nice instrument and seems well-made. Item was bought for a 12YO, first year in middle school and just learning how to play. Since it is for a child, I opted for the extended warranty for peace of mind. It came with several accessories and the case is sturdy. Regarding the case, the only reason for the loss of a star is because the Velcro on the top has already ripped away. It appears that the Velcro edges just simply unraveled and pulled away from the stitching with the constant opening. All accessories don't fit in the case (like the stand) but the important things do very easily. Would recommend for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Annie515GW

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Even though many others had problems with this item I purchased it anyway. Listen to the reviews. My flute arrived in what I thought was good condition. When I tried to play it I couldn’t get the G or F# notes out. The higher notes are ok but it’s difficult to play the lower octave. Definitely not a good flute. Classic case of you get what you pay for. I’m sending it back for a refund and have already ordered a more expensive flute to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Herbst

customer_reviews.title: It didn't impress me. There were some metal that ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't impress me. There were some metal that had already scrapped off. The foot joint took at least five minutes to get off from the body. I struggled so hard (but gently) to get it off the body. I only had it for 30 minutes and assembling and removing took awhile. I got it today after ordering it two days ago but now I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the product works beforehand
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to purchase this flute with all that came with it at such an awesome price. My daughter started beginner band and I was told that this would be a great option to get. I'm not sure if all of them are made this way, but there was a defect or something. We had to take it in to the music shop to get it fixed and it cost the same amount for repair as it did to purchase. It also discouraged our daughter to the point that she no longer wanted to be in band. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: As a former flute player I was sceptical about this purchase for my daughter who is now playing the flute, we kind of bought it on a fluke because we couldn't find my old flutes. I must say though it plays beautifully and has a lovely tone, great for beginners and comes in awesome colors! My daughter absolutely loves her flute and that she's the only one with this "rare" colored flute and Mom is loving the price, what a steal for such a beautiful instrument! Definitely not disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Agoody

customer_reviews.title: I bought this item for my grand-daughter last year, ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my grand-daughter last year, as a starter instrument, as she decided she wanted to join the high school band, She is still playing it, but we decided to buy her a more advanced intrument this year, to help her continue to grow with the beauty of amusical instrument. This will certainly do the job for a first time player, until they decide wither or not they will stay interested in playing in the band.
customer_reviews.author: oliver h johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: It barely fit together head joint didn't fit (too loose). Doesn't play worth 10 dollar penny whistle. I am sending it back. This is not even a beginner flute.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Flute for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 4th/5th grade music, the flute is perfect and came with everything shown. Great quality for the price and plays very nicely. Definitely a recommended buy for an entry level student.
customer_reviews.author: Just trying to help =)

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t play, good for a prop.
customer_reviews.text: The flute doesn’t play, there’s a leak starting around the G key. My tutor said this brand is cheap and will repeatedly need repairs. The pro shops in my area won’t touch it. Only buy it if you want a shiny instrument for pictures or something.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful look and sound for my beginner flute playing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful look and sound for my beginner flute playing, 13 yr. old daughter. Nice case and accessories. The book would not be adequate, but we are using it with  with good success. Very happy with this flute!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dicker

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive alternative to renting a flute for school band for a beginning player.
customer_reviews.text: Nice package of accessories. My child was not very careful with his flute when he first started. Dropped the flute in the case down a flight of stone steps and badly damaged the flute and case. This flute's case is lighter, however, better padded inside. The flute got a thumbs up from the teacher for a beginning player. If he sticks with the flute and is older and more responsible we will consider a better flute. I was afraid this was going to be a piece of junk and hesitated to purchase it. Now I am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Noone

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this and I was told that it would likely ...
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting a top-of-the line instrument, but I was expecting to get a working product. This came with the "D" not working properly and I had to take it to a music store. I was told it would cost $50 to fix, which is almost what I paid for the product! I would not recommend this and I was told that it would likely break again and there would be issues down the road getting the parts necessary to fix it. Spend a little more money and get something you can use, which will be my next step!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McEver

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Surprise for Me!
customer_reviews.text: I played the flute in high school so my husband surprised me with this to get back into playing. It's good quality and well made. The sound is clear and it comes with very nice case with a stand, and cleaning cloth with a stick of wax for connecting. It also has a book with notes and key positions. I am happy with it and would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: mudd

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this flute for my daughter to begin taking band lessons at school less than 2 months ago. Unfortunately, one of the keys is already stuck and does not return after being pressed. It has lasted two months! It says in the description that one should be able to buy it with peace of mind because it comes with a 1 year warranty. Let's see if they come through. If not, will have buy different flute from another company. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: The color easily gets off on the colored flute.
customer_reviews.text: The flute it self is pretty good but, I dislike that the flute is colored bad and the color easily gets off.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Nice Flute / Nice Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this flute for my 6th grader. This is his first year in band and this flute is perfect. He picked it up and started playing it and I didn't have to put him in a closet to drowned out the noise, because it sounded beautiful. I would recommend this flute to anyone who is a beginner and looking for a quality instrument without spending a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeLover

customer_reviews.title: the price is awesome. We looked around the music stores and they ...
customer_reviews.text: First off, the price is awesome. We looked around the music stores and they are expensive. My son needed it for school and I really don’t want to spend a lot of money. We bought this and not expecting much but boy it really lived up to our expectations and more. Looks great and looks expensive. My son really likes it and we can’t even see the difference from the ones we saw at the store. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Raldy A.

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS INSTRUMENT!! My daughter used it this school year and a few months in it had a leak and now has to be replaced or fixed. I contacted the seller because it is still under warranty and not only do I have to pay for shipping to send it back to them but could possibly be charged for repairs??? What a joke!! Buyer Beware!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful instrument
customer_reviews.text: I was going to cancel the order for personal reasons but the order was shipped roughly an hour after I paid. So very impressed, not only is the instrument inexpensive and quickly shipped but upon arrival it was so beautiful. It was packed very securely inside the case (which in itself I adore). Once I put it together and started playing the sound was (for a closed hole) so very beautiful. Considering what I paid I am over the moon happy with this instrument and recommend it to novices and those who simply want to play at home again after years away.
customer_reviews.author: Faeryearth

customer_reviews.title: 2) While playing the flute it starts making a weird squicky sound not good for musicals We paid around $80 for this flute ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product on 9/30/2017 and today it is 12/06/2017. So we bought this product for my child in middle school and this flute only worked 2 months now the issues with this product is as below: 1) around the mouth hole it starts turning brown. 2) While playing the flute it starts making a weird squicky sound not good for musicals We paid around $80 for this flute but it only lasted 2 months and it is “dead” now. Can the seller replace my item as it should have a warranty for at least one year.
customer_reviews.author: Kotu

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: We have a 6th Grader who just started band this year. We bought 2 of these this school year and each one only lasted 3-4 months before they broke. We've moved on to something nicer. If you have a child that just started band and you don't want to buy an expensive instrument before you are sure your kid is committed, this is the instrument for you. Otherwise, I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: POPMUZIK

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and it works
customer_reviews.text: It's my first flute, and it plays perfectly. The action is smooth and no leaks. The case protects, the stand is handy. What more could you ask for? You could pay more than this just to maintain a more expensive flute every couple of years. (If any of this was helpful, kindly click to say so. Thanks!)
customer_reviews.author: Steve Naz

customer_reviews.title: Get a better quality instrument
customer_reviews.text: I have played the flute for 30 years and bought this one for my daughter to begin learning on. I thought it would be a good one to begin with to see if she wants to stick with this instrument. The sound is okay. It sounds like there is too much air escaping from the keys so the sound is airy. Also, the F note is hard to get. You cannot get a solid F sound. I would recommend spending more and getting a better quality instrument.
customer_reviews.author: familyfred

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money and a beginner
customer_reviews.text: A lot less expensive than renting. My child is new to band and we didn't want to have to worry about renting so we decided on purchasing one instead and we are extremely glad we did. Has everything that one needs to begin with. Highly advised for parents with children just going into band, great starter kit!
customer_reviews.author: garrett

customer_reviews.title: Flute Loops...Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when my flute arrived! I played YEARS ago and couldn't wait to get back to it!! Nice flute for the price. Arrived on time as promised! This is the 3rd Mendini instrument that I have purchased and have been extremely satisfied with!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for elementary school, especially when half the kids quite after a year. The flute is a tough instrument to learn, but my daughter seems to be sticking with it, so this instrument is serving its purpose. If she still at it in a couple of years, we’ll upgrade to a Yamaha.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last a year!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it February 2018 for my son. It’s out of tune and a few tunes are no longer playing by December 2018. Take it to local music store to help with tuning. They said it would cost more than the price of this flute to repair. We ended up buying another flute from local music store.
customer_reviews.author: the amazonian

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Learning flute is a hard task to begin with. This flute adds to the frustration. It doesn't make good sound, and a few keys wouldn't close. My daughter was so frustrated with this flute that she was about to quit learning. Her teach offered her a different flute, and she instantly made big progress. If you want your kid to learn and love flute, spend more money on a better flute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner flute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old daughter. She Started learning to play the flute with a high quality rental flute. She complained about how difficult it was to use. So I bought her this one and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: JaMo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome...
customer_reviews.text: ...little flute, great tone, play-ability everything. I got this for my brother who played years ago, he picked it up started playing and was really impressed which is hard to do with him. Said it was on par in quality with the olds flute he had previously...quite impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Risenheart Consulting

customer_reviews.title: Problems.....Change my review
customer_reviews.text: This flute is not working very well. The keys keep getting stuck in messes up the whole sound of the flute. I wish I had an 800 number so I could call for a new product. This one is defected. Updated 3-1-18 I contact the company about a week ago and explain to them the musical instrument was not working. They did some troubleshooting and realize it was broke, then sent me out a new one with a return slip of the old one. They did a great job 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Had it one month and the thumb b flat key is broken
customer_reviews.text: The metal immediately blackens on keys and around embouchure hole. The cleaning cloth doesn't help. Two of the keys were sticking immediately. It's impossible to fully close foot joint even with the joint grease. I know it's very inexpensive, but still, it's not worth the price. I'll return it and see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: JUNK DO NOT BUY UNLESS FOR DECORATION
customer_reviews.text: We have barely touched this instrument, her teacher noticed one of the notes was off, sent it to repair, they said this brand is so cheap , you can't get parts, they fall apart, and cost more to fix than to buy them. Repair companies will not touch them. CRAP CRAP CRAP. now my daughter is broken hearted that her flute is junk.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Remember a flute is very fragile an a cheap flute will not be worked on by any good repair place
customer_reviews.text: I was scared of all the negative reviews. I now had this flute for 4 months now. A Flute is very fragile by nature. I play many instruments an this unit has not chipped, gone out of intonation or any of the other complainants I've see here. Remember a flute is very fragile an a cheap flute will not be worked on by any good repair place. if treated with respect this is a very good unit. You could have a $2k flute an not take care of it, will have same problems
customer_reviews.author: haygar

customer_reviews.title: Plays out of tune.
customer_reviews.text: Our school music teacher would not accept for elementary lessons. Said it plays out of tune and needs frequent repair. It was boxed nicely just not good quality from what he said.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: the flute seemed like a great buy
customer_reviews.text: At first, the flute seemed like a great buy. We received it and followed instruction on how to put it together. It worked fine for approximately one month and now the end piece (not sure what it is called exactly) keeps falling off while he is trying to play. He has followed all instructions from his bad teacher and nothing is fixing this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: garbage. Returned it and got a real flute
customer_reviews.text: garbage. Returned it and got a real flute. Had it checked out by our flute teacher first to confirm that it wasn't really worth it, even for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: MellyWhoDo

customer_reviews.title: Good for a start.
customer_reviews.text: Decent for what it is. I bought this because I wasn't sure if I wanted to take up the flute as a hobby. I couldn't see going through all the expense of buying a quality flute or renting to test the waters. The sound isn't concert quality, but if you want to see if it's right for you, this is not a bad choice. This cost less than two months rental from a music store.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Great starter flute!
customer_reviews.text: I returned a $1000 flute - my daughter's first instrument - out of fear of her deciding to quit band. After only a few months, my premonition became reality and she quit. Now I don't feel so bad about this purchase, and her younger sister now has a predestined band instrument as well! Win - Win!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K.

customer_reviews.title: Paint has peeled off within 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I am thankful for Mendini who sent a replacement flute for one whose paint peeled. I appreciate their gesture. Thanks. I bought the nickel colored one. Sound coming out of this flute is ok. However I am disappointed as paint has peeld off in.most places and it has started looking ugly.. Not sure if this is covered in their warranty...
customer_reviews.author: KNH

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. The quality is so terrible the pieces when assembled come off due to improve fit and design.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewNinja

customer_reviews.title: Excellent student flute
customer_reviews.text: I encourage new students to buy this flute to see if the instrument is for them. You are not going to get a flute that you will use for life, but you can't get better value than this for someone who is unsure if the instrument is for him or her.
customer_reviews.author: Simcha Vessason

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son. He couldn't play it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He couldn't play it. Turns out all of the buttons, or finger holds, not sure what you call them but they were all misaligned. Had to pay $80 to have it fixed and tuned.
customer_reviews.author: Tristian Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I’m still think it’s worthy of 5 stars, but I did have to fix a spring that was bent out of place, thankfully I was able to do that with the kit that came along. I use to play in school, and I haven’t played in a long time and this package has nearly everything you need to help you start out. Definitely worth it for such a low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Hadsell

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING VALUE for the money !!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe that an instrument like this can be manufactured, packed, shipped and delivered for this price !!! I had to see it for myself...I purchased it for a third grader and it is perfect! Key action and Tone are more than acceptable! If your child/grandchild is not sure if they want to learn the flute this is an inexpensive way to find out. Once your student learns the basics you will want to purchase a better flute, but I can’t emphasize enough what a great bargain this is. I’ve been playing the flute all my life and I’m blown away at the quality of this instrument for the price...Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cox, Oklahoma City

customer_reviews.title: great for my 5th grader
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend hundreds on a flute for 5th grade band, so I took a chance on an amazon flute. I'm so glad! My daughter says her flute sounds way better than her friends' expensive flutes. Maybe her self-confidence is too high, but I still think the product is worth buying for a kid to start off with.
customer_reviews.author: EmCRight

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this flute for two and a half years. My daughter uses it in junior high band. She has never had problems with it. Her teacher says it has good sound. The finish is rubbing off. Today after two and a half years a pad needs replaced. But other than that it has been a great beginner flute.
customer_reviews.author: Runnindherd

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's good for the price. It is not very durable but last one year before I had to buy a new one. Cheaper than instrument store. The price to fix was 10 dollars less then the flute. So I just bought a new one. The sound is okay. She's a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: When something goes wrong-no person is accountable!
customer_reviews.text: Total frustration! Bought for my grandson. Why did the bottom piece not stay on? Three sections right? They slide into each other. The bottom became lose and won't stay secured. So it's useless! I sent email to the company via Amazon. We should hear back in 2 days. It's been weeks-NOTHING! And I've tried to contact AMAZON...whoever that might be. Can't determine correct box to check. Of course, NO PHONE NUMBER TO TALK TO REAL PEOPLE. OH, and supposedly we have a warranty. SAVE YOUR MONEY, Better yet, SAVE YOUR SANITY-LOSING MINE. - Sandra M -not Diane
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Four weeks and broken!
customer_reviews.text: After 4 week the bottom part is falling and some of the keys don't work an I never received the gloves or grease. Im sending it back, I hope that goes smooth. I knew this was a cheaper flute but I expected it to last at least a year maybe longer. Don't buy cheap and buy from good companies, get the real thing and save money in long run.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: It came warped. My daughter started her lessons and ...
customer_reviews.text: It came warped. My daughter started her lessons and the instructor let us know because of the defect that certain holes wont open/close and the ones that don't work are very important especially to someone just learning. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids starting band.
customer_reviews.text: Item was just as described. My daughter plays the saxophone and decided to change to flute. I did not want to spend a lot of money on a new instrument that she may not even like as much as the saxophone. She has played it for about a month now and has had no problems and it has a really good sound for a reasonably priced flute. It would be great for a kid starting band or if someone just wants an extra practice flute
customer_reviews.author: Tc Hefty

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: If I could have given this 0 stars, I would have. I bought this flute for my daughter. It is junk. The nickel plating was flaking off within weeks ant the foot joint is too loose. Trust me, buy a flute fro Yamaha, Gemeinhardt or Armstrong, but don't waste your money on Mendini.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Bronco Fan

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, and of course it's too late to return ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's music teacher warned us to not go with this one at the begining of the year. We ordered it anyway. She didn't even make it to her first concert without it breaking. Very disappointed, and of course it's too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Lachowin

customer_reviews.title: Busted after just a few months and we can’t find ...
customer_reviews.text: Busted after just a few months and we can’t find anyone who can fix Mendini. Not made well save your money
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner flute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her flute. I thought that it sounds a little off, but that’s just me...and it’s for a beginner. Overall, it’s perfect for practicing at this stage.
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 months pads need to be replaced already and it will cost more to fix then the value of the flute. unable to return to amazon have to contact company for warranty in the mean time my daughter is missing her school band sessions. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: steve beauchesne

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: This thing was broken when we got it and I went and spent $100 to get it fixed and it continues to break! I couldn’t return it because she needed it ASAP. Such a waste of $169!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Wendling

customer_reviews.title: Always in need of repair
customer_reviews.text: I paid $146 at the time for this. My daughter has used it for 2 years in school and it has already had to be repaired three times costing about $40 each time. So I've put in almost the same amount in repairs as it cost to buy it brand new. Very disappointing. Wouldn't buy again. I think she'll just borrow from the school next year because I don't want to buy her a new one and the cost of fixing it is getting to high.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need to get this
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality. I love it. Its my first attempt at wind, think we might have to go to councelling, all my fault
customer_reviews.author: David Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: With in a month, keys sticking and a screw has fallen out. The finish has rubbed away on one spot as well. Not worth it to try and save a couple hundred on a good student flute. Go find a good used one, or start with a rental.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Butler

customer_reviews.title: For the price - it's good enough. No major complaints
customer_reviews.text: For the price - it's good enough. No major complaints, but be aware that the tone is not wonderful and the blue coating easily scratches off. Also, I cannot for the life of me get the headjoint cork to budge for tuning. But hey - you get what you pay for :)
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Defective.
customer_reviews.text: It did not play D, E flat, or F. Unfortunately we did not realize this until the return window had closed. I basically threw my money away on this.
customer_reviews.author: GraceWins

customer_reviews.title: Im sick of paying
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flute 4 months ago and the F key has broken 2 times so i had to get it adjusted which is $60 which means i paid $120 plus the almost $70 to pay for the flute i only play an hour 7 times a week sometimes not even every day of the week i play gently and take care of it i dont know what to do anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Pick another brand
customer_reviews.text: First purchase lasted 6 months. Second purchase did not play 2 notes on delivery. Wasted my money twice.
customer_reviews.author: grammy

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: 3 months after purchase one of the keys started to fall apart, had to get it fixed 7 months later another key was getting stuck, and it cost as much as to buy a new to get it fixed. Now I am looking to buy a new flute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son for band because it seems cheap and that's all I could afford at that time and it says warranty so i thought that was great , he loves it, but now some of the cords not sounding right, i just read some reviews about the warranty and it seems like a hassle and costly to have that repaired, I don't know what to do?? and it sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: My 5th grader likes it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter who started band in 5th grade. Her older sister played the flute in middle school and high school. She liked it Especially since it comes with all the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: MS808mom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give a zero. Don’t buy! My son has only used this for about a month at school. Had trouble getting it in tune. Found out the whole thing needs taken apart and the pads shimmed. Would cost almost as much as a brand new, higher quality flute. Very low/poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: SilentValor

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but impressed
customer_reviews.text: This flute for this price is beyond impressive. Great sound, quality instrument and perfect for a young beginner who is learning to play and care for an instrument.
customer_reviews.author: A Ping

customer_reviews.title: Great flute
customer_reviews.text: Great flute for beginners! My son first year in band and his teacher said this is an awesome flute for beginners. She's recommending to all her future students.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs . . .
customer_reviews.text: This isn't "just" a flute for me! It is to be used for respiratory therapy in conjunction with a dysphonic voice disorder. It is/will be ,quite literally, a lifeline to speech for me. Thank you for making it so reasonable in price.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: It plays great and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new flute. It was in our price range and I think some music teachers forget that most Americans are on a tight budget. You'd think that being a public school teacher would allow her to realize that before she tells my daughter that this brand "is a piece of crap". It plays great and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good for Beginner
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using it for 3 months now, so far so good. The sound is ok and wish it is a bit cheaper but it is good for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Angel2000

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STARTER FLUTE.
customer_reviews.text: Impressed! Purchased this economy priced flute for our daughter as she starts band. Cost of flue is almost cheaper than renting! GREAT STARTER FLUTE. Nice kit and the stand is a bonus that non of her classmates have.
customer_reviews.author: cenexgirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing instrument for an equally amazing price
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to believe that an instrument of this general quality can be produced and sold at the incredible price offered.
customer_reviews.author: TerTer

customer_reviews.title: The Mouse Pieces have stain mark
customer_reviews.text: Be aware the mouse piece color distortion. In the image mouse piece have black shadow mark. Only used for few times...
customer_reviews.author: Peter C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for beginners. Tends to tarnish a bit, but can't complain for the price. Comes with cleaning kit, carrying case, etc. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it works much better than expected. I only bought it to see if I could still play and if I'd deserve a better instrument later. The pieces could fit better, so I wouldn't recommend it for someone who is a new learner that frequently needs to disassemble it since I'm afraid of breaking it due to the force needed to take it apart.

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter for band. This is her first year in band and I didn't want to spend a lot of money renting an instrument. This was a great price and is perfect for beginners. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Flute
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my daughter school needs, she started learning, I am not sure, how much she is utilizing this product. I feel little bit expensive
customer_reviews.author: Yp

customer_reviews.title: good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: good for startster and beginners who do not mind the quality of sound... for practice before advancing to the next level.
customer_reviews.author: GuichiLobos

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument for the money.
customer_reviews.text: My wife needed a "backup" flute for Praise band and loved the sky blue color of this one. With the tone and sound quality that this flute has, it is becoming her primary instrument rather than the backup. Love it. Will most likely order other colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M Young

customer_reviews.title: rubber pad is detached.
customer_reviews.text: One of the rubber pads is detached after two days playing. So, the key of A (La) is opened at higher position than the other keys when fingers does not press keys.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Updated: changed rating from 1 star to 4, due to earlier problem, otherwise would be 5. After assembling and disassembling a few times, the issue went away, somehow the fit loosened up. I did not need to call about the warranty to have the flute replaced. The flute cannot be properly assembled, one part is too tight and does not fit well. A flute repair shop refused to repair it and said the repair would cause more damage. I could not return the flute because kid's lesson started 1 month after I bought the flute, we only discovered the problem once the lessons started. It didn't occur to me that there would be an assembly issue.
customer_reviews.author: M.K.

customer_reviews.title: Good overall package deal ...
customer_reviews.text: It's light weight, the included instructions were helpful, the case is sturdy and I really liked the color ...
customer_reviews.author: dennisnv

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound and Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an Amazing instrument for beginners, I came from playing brass to learn flute, this one is just so easy to play and get around it, it even sounds better than my friend’s flute which is about 7-8 times this price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in love with her instrument! It sounds great, which has given my beginner a huge confidence boost
customer_reviews.author: tclme

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner flute
customer_reviews.text: Great flute! I loved how easy it was to play, only defect was that the keys either stuck or you had to press hard to close the hole. Otherwise wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Danysully

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has used it less then 3 months for her school band lessons and I was told by the teacher that he couldn’t fix the problems with the sound. I am asked to either buy another instrument or rent another one. Not just a waste of money for parents, but also so much frustration for the child and unnecessary work for the teacher.
customer_reviews.author: G.G

customer_reviews.title: I'm a beginner
customer_reviews.text: It arrived very quickly seeming that I'm in the UK and the flute was in USA. It's beautiful to look at and I'm starting to get to grips with simple tunes. The booklet that comes with it wasn't much use to me but I bought a beginner's book and am now doing ok (slowly but that's me not the flute :D)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Partridge

customer_reviews.title: Great flute!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high-quality flute at a great price. We bought it as a gift for my nephew, and he was so excited. He couldn’t believe he got a real flute. It comes with everything you need and it’s very beautiful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the money - great value. Love the case and stand that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: L'il A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the money..A great flute at any price..Plays great down to low C..
customer_reviews.author: Marc Mc

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back the next day
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back. A couple of notes wouldn't work and was grossly out of tune. Seller gave no trouble for the return and we were refunded promptly.
customer_reviews.author: 95dcm

product_meta.title: Mendini Closed Hole C Flute with Stand, 1 Year Warranty, Case, Cleaning Rod, Cloth, Joint Grease, and Gloves (Nickel Plated)
product_meta.description: Color:Nickel PlatedMendini by Cecilio flutes are one of best selling, teachers approved flutes. It features flawless finish, closed hole, undercut beveled embouchure, with high quality double bladder pads. This flute package includes pro-deluxe durable plush-lined nylon covered lightweight hard case w/ shoulder strap and zipper pocket, soft cleaning cloth, cleaning rod, joint grease, and a pair of white gloves. Buy with confidence as it comes with a 1- year warranty against any manufacturer's defects.
feature_bullets: Closed hole C Flute with offset G key and split E key, 16 keys
Undercut beveled embouchure, high quality double bladder pads and rubber key bumpers
Includes: Durable case, joint grease, cleaning cloth & rod, and a pair of gloves
Bonus: Cecilio foldable flute stand and flute pocketbook

1-Year Warranty: Each instrument is tested at Cecilio's factory overseas and are tested again in their local warehouse in Southern California. Each instrument comes with a 1-year warranty against manufacturer’s defects and are serviced locally. If you have any questions, feel free to reach us by message or our toll free number to contact our support team.
